response.job_title: Commercial Intelligence & Performance | Planning | Revenue | Strategy | Marketing || Industrial and Civil Engr. Mktg & negotiation techniques. Transport Spc. Commercial, planning, ops, admin. and financial experience
response.summary:
Ingeniera Industrial de la Universidad Católica de Colombia e Ingeniera Civil de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia Especialista en Transporte, con doble competencia (DUT) en Techniques de Commercialisation de la Université Pierre Mendès France en Grenoble, Francia. 

Experiencia en la parte Comercial y planificación (Inteligencia Comercial y Revenue Analysis), experiencia en la parte Administrativa financiera y en la parte Operacional. 

Manejo de herramientas para inteligencia de negocio como Tableau. Conocimientos en Gestión de Proyectos de Ingeniería - PMI - Gerencia de proyectos,  Management/Gestion des Entreprise y Análisis comercial y financiero.

Idiomas: Español, Inglés (B2), Francés (B2)

Celular: +573002674435
response.skills: Estrategia empresarial, Planificación estratégica, Revenue Analysis, Planificación de proyectos, Administración y dirección de empresas, Ingeniería, Transporte, Ingeniería civil, Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Sales, Sales Management, Transportation, Key Performance Indicators, Strategic Planning, Sales & Marketing, Aviation, Forecasting, Demand Planning, Planning

company.name: PriceTravel Holding
company.description:
PriceTravel Holding was founded in 2000 as a global distribution company with a strong focus on Latin America and The Caribbean. The company is present in Mexico, Colombia, the United States, and Brazil, and its distribution network reaches over 50 source markets. 

Business units and brands

B2C: PriceTravel and TiquetesBaratos.com
Top OTAs in Mexico and Colombia with innovative technological assets, the best user-friendly experience, and call centers with high-level services and facilities and inbound/outbound sales models and customer services.
More than 100 points of sale located in major shopping centers in Mexico and Colombia offer customized assistance through these brands.

B2B: Travelinn, PriceAgencies & Connect
Hosting more than 9,000 travel agencies, Travelinn in Mexico and PriceAgencies in Colombia and the United States provide assistance to travel agencies through an integrated technological platform with a broad range of products and services.  

Connect is a cutting-edge platform deriving from a strong investment in development resources and human capital. This brand places the company as a regional leader, reaching international source markets and becoming one of the most important at a global level. 

B2B2C: B2BTravel Program
An integral concept for business partners that provides them with a booking engine for travel services on their websites. This program develops and manages more than 300 websites.

MICE: BTC
BTC specializes in business tourism, with an experienced professional team that designs efficient plans for congresses, conventions, group events, and national and international incentive trips. A leading company with top technology for business meetings.

PriceTravel Holding is a thriving corporate whose growth and development are made possible by always being at the forefront, a challenge that has managed to overcome with the creativity and innovation of more than 1,000 employees.
